1370: Geldmaro moved to Waale straet.B.4 after marriage.
Got married to Ghodelde at age 20 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Ghodelde, at age 20.
1371: Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Verthwi, at age 21.
1372: Had a son with Ghodelde, Ghiselijn, at age 22.
Lost daughter Ghodelde when Ghodelde was 3 years old.
1374: Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Linnea, at age 24.
1378: Had a son with Ghodelde, Tarun, at age 28.
1381: Lost son Walic when Walic was 0 years old.
Ghodelde gave birth to their stillborn son Walic in 1381.
1383: Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Brundonis, at age 33.
